author: sky.cactus
content: Short answer: State growth.  We want anyone to be able to run an Ethereum client on their desktop/laptop.  Right now that isn't reasonable, but it is the goal we are working toward.  The higher the transaction throughput, the faster state grows and the bigger the hard drive necessary to use Ethereum.
